description: Tool to assist with building the Mario 64 PC port
notes: MSYS2 can be retrieved via scoop: "scoop install msys2".
When ran, sm64pcbuilder2 will ask for MSYS2 location, and it will go over
your MSYS2 install for latest updates and fixes, so don't be alarmed.
MSYS2 updates on the scoop-side *may* require sm64pcbuilder2 recheck and rebuild MSYS2 to its needs.
If you wish to delete config, it is stored in "C:\Users\<username>\AppData\Local\gunvalk-Filipianosol-GTN".
It seems to store settings per-version, so persistence is unlikely through updates.
